channel.title: My idea!
channel.description:
Okay so i have this idea for a website... i can do all the graphical stuff and some coding... i just need help with the navigation bit and well... okay i need help with it all but only minor pointings. The main thing i need help with is the navigation bar because it's going to be using mootools (http://mootools.net/).
Here is my design (note the banner, text and font will all change as will bits you dont like.)
[img]http://img451.imageshack.us/img451/7786/templatepc4.png[/img]
So please help me somebody!

item.title: My idea!
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

[quote=“N00b1, post:22, topic:73928”][quote author=YourDistracted link=topic=108550.msg1107196#msg1107196 date=1175936271]
N00b1 can you please learn to spell. It hurts my eyes when i read your posts and it annoys me that you got that award (congrats) and can’t spell.
[/quote] thanks for the grats but i cant help it i have had a real bad prob with spelling i just cant i use ff dictanary but i still have to correct a load if you don’t like it i cant help it[/quote]
No your just a lazy moron, who doesn’t WANT to spell seriously you don’t need a dictionary you need a brain. How can you do any coding if you can’t even write English properly.

Read full topic

item.title: My idea!
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

RXVL:

Alright, sorry I haven’t responded in a while, I’ve been busy. I’m working on the nav bar and it looks absolutely wonderful. I just need to know what kind of links you want on there and their URLs.

Umm…oops? I have scraped the idea and i made this site instead: illuscripters.ulmb.com BUT! lmao its not just another gay forum community. It’s a nice template that i will release after i have finished my portfolio site O:O:O

item.title: My idea!
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

RXVL:

I can do the nav bar in Flash for you. I have 3 years of experience in Flash and animating and stuff like it. By the way, what font is that for your website? I want that

Okay yeh i know i suck… it a bit more than 3 hours but alot of freaky shizzle happened. Anyways the font is called stylograph and here is the download linky: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GO1UZDXK

kloplop321:

well, it is a nice graphical design, dont like the shiny rat in armor. but I think the sides with the links need some more contrast

The shiny thing was just to make a kind of banner thing. It’s not part of the final design. Also i shall change the links.

Can anyone else help me code this site because i have a limited idea of what im doing. Once i see the code i will learn so much and understand so much more!

Read full topic
